interests.CanAdd: Haeba u ntse u sa fumane seo u se batlang, u ka kenya thahasello e ncha tlase:
interests.TrySynonyms: U se ke ua e bona? Leka li-synonyms tse ling.

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Molaetsa o 'nile oa tšoaetsoa bakeng sa tlhahlobo ea admin. Tlanya hape ho unflag.
chat.noOneSaid: Ha ho motho ea buileng letho
chat.closeChatConfirm: Na u netefatsa hore u batla ho koala puisano ee?

notifications.Streams\/invite: U ile ua memeloa ho {{& stream.fields.title}}
notifications.Streams\/access: {{&call 'avatar.displayName'}} e fetotse monyetla oa ho fumana molaetsa

dialog.photoInstruction: Haeba motho ea hlahlobang khoutu ea hau ea QR a le ka pel'a hao, nka setšoantšo sa bona
dialog.title: Mema
dialog.placeholder: Nomoro ea mohala kapa aterese ea imeile
dialog.orInvite: Kapa u meme batho ka ho sebelisa:

email.subject: Hey, hlahloba sena
email.PleaseVisitLink: Ka kopo, etela kgokahanyo e latelang:

sms.content: U mengoe ho {{title}}. Ka kōpo tlanya {{url}}

notice.text: U memetsoe. {{ClickOrTap}} mona ho amohela le ho ikopanya.

mobile.alert: Memo e romeloa ho tloha palo ea rona, eo metsoalle ea hau e sa e tsebeng. Latela ka temana e potlakileng ho ba tsebisa memo eo e tsoa ho uena, u ba kōpe hore ba tobetse konteraka.
mobile.confirm: Memo e romeloa ho tloha palo ea rona, eo metsoalle ea hau e sa e tsebeng. Na o ka rata ho latela le mongolo o potlakileng ho ba tsebisa memo eo e tsoa ho uena, o ba kopa ho tobetsa konteraka.
mobile.check: Hey, ke u rometse memo ho {{app}} app. Ka kopo sheba li-sms tsa hau mme o tobetsa sekahare!

email.alert: Memo e romeloa ho tsoa ho domain, eo metsoalle ea hau e sa e tsebeng. Latela ka temana e potlakileng ho ba tsebisa memo eo e tsoa ho uena, u ba kōpe hore ba tobetse konteraka.
email.confirm: Memo e romeloa ho tsoa ho domain, eo metsoalle ea hau e sa e tsebeng. Na o ka rata ho latela le mongolo o potlakileng ho ba tsebisa memo eo e tsoa ho uena, o ba kopa ho tobetsa konteraka.
email.subject: O fumane tumemo?
email.body: Hey, ke u rometse memo ho {{app}} app. Ka kopo, sheba lengolo la hau la imeile mme o tobetsa konteraka ho eona!
